availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Grundy County, Missouri, saddler. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Ford Crow in Garrard County, Kentucky on June 17, 1841. Father of Melissa Crow. Saddler in Grundy County, Missouri in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Missouri, Grundy County, Trenton, p. 301.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Garrard County Marriages, Film #000183256, p. 21.
Find A Grave, "Milton Crow (1818-1910)," Memorial #9492059, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/9492059 (accessed May 16, 2020).
